sentences.sContent: One of these was laced with a bitter additive that could be detected only on contact .
sentences.sContent_eng: One of these was laced with a bitter additive that could be detected only on contact .
sentences.sCn: 其中一种含有一些只有接触才能发现的苦味的添加剂。

sentences.sContent: Introducing the uniquely Boolean concept of complementation into an additive identity, we find an interesting effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Introducing the uniquely Boolean concept of complementation into an additive identity, we find an interesting effect.
sentences.sCn: 介绍了独特的逻辑概念的互补成添加剂的特性，我们发现一个有趣的结果。

sentences.sContent: As mentioned above, it was a very iterative process where all of the element were slowly built up together through additive and subtraction means.
sentences.sContent_eng: As mentioned above, it was a very iterative process where all of the element were slowly built up together through additive and subtraction means.
sentences.sCn: 正如以上所提到的，将不同的元素通过加法和减法的方式，慢慢地组合到一起是一个需要不断反复的过程。

words.tran: 添加；[数] 加法；增加物
蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）
增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和

trans.tranOther: a substance that is added to food to improve its taste, appearance etc
